original_text: They will all say this about me: “The Lord alone is true and strong.” ’ Everybody who has been angry with God will come to him. They will be ashamed that they were angry. They will all say this about me: “The Lord alone is true and strong.” ’ Everybody who has been angry with God will come to him. They will be ashamed that they were angry. They will all say this about me: “The Lord alone is true and strong.” ’ Everybody who has been angry with God will come to him. They will be ashamed that they were angry. They will all say this about me:
korean_text: 내게 대한 어떤 자의 말에 공의와 힘은 여호와께만 있나니 사람들이 그에게로 나아갈 것이라 무릇 그에게 노하는 자는 부끄러움을 당하리라 그러나

sentences.original_text: They will all say this about me:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 나에 대해 이렇게 말할 것입니다:

sentences.original_text: The Lord alone is true and strong.
Everybody who has been angry with God
